item.title: Information about the merger
item.description: Choosing a union to represent you in the workplace is extremely important. Choose CUPE. At CUPE, we have dedicated staff and member-organizers to be there for you, through every step of the PSLRTA process. Together we are stronger. CUPE is a great union with an excellent track record of protecting and making gains for our members. CUPE is Ontarioâ€™s largest union with over 75,000 CUPE members working in health care.
